item.title: My korasi Equip is different for males and females [PI] 317
item.dc:creator: @50percentelf 50percentelf
item.description:
@50percentelf wrote:

so my korasi equipment appears below males, but appears in the hand of females.

[code]case 13350:
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 57780;//female
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 9;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1050;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1200;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 280;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 57784;
itemDef.modelID = 57784;
itemDef.name = “Korasi’s Sword”;
itemDef.anInt188 = -1;//female sleeve
itemDef.anInt164 = -1;//male sleeve
itemDef.description = “A sword from the void.”.getBytes();

break;[/code]

Read full topic
